Description: Popular remote access software used by businesses and individuals for IT support and remote work.
RecommendedAction: Verify you or your IT department installed this. Remove if unknown.

Description: Professional remote desktop software commonly used by IT support teams and businesses for accessing computers remotely.
RecommendedAction: Check if this was installed by you or your company's IT department.

Description: Google's remote access service (Chromoting) that allows remote desktop access through Chrome browser.
RecommendedAction: Verify you intentionally enabled Chrome Remote Desktop. Check if legitimate tech support installed this. Remove if unauthorized.

Description: Professional remote access and IT management platform used by businesses for IT support and system administration.
RecommendedAction: Verify with your IT department that this is authorized business software.

Description: GoTo remote access tool (formerly LogMeIn Resolve) used for IT support and remote assistance. Can be legitimate or used maliciously.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was installed by legitimate IT support. Remove immediately if installed by unknown callers or scammers.

Description: Professional IT management platform (formerly ScreenConnect) used by managed service providers to monitor and control business computers.
RecommendedAction: Verify your business has a contract with an IT service provider. Remove if unauthorized.

Description: Commercial remote desktop software used for remote access and IT support. Popular in business environments.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was installed by your IT department or for legitimate remote access needs.

Description: Virtual Network Computing software that allows remote desktop access. Often used by IT professionals and advanced users.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was intentionally installed for legitimate remote access needs.

Description: Open source VNC software for remote desktop access and control.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was intentionally installed for legitimate remote access needs.

Description: Free VNC software for remote desktop access and control.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was intentionally installed for legitimate remote access needs.

Description: Commercial VNC software for secure remote desktop access.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was intentionally installed for legitimate remote access needs.

Description: Remote desktop software popular in enterprise environments for IT administration.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was installed by your IT department for system administration.

Description: Commercial remote desktop service for accessing computers remotely.
RecommendedAction: Verify you subscribed to this service intentionally for remote access needs.

Description: Professional IT management tool used by system administrators for remote computer management and software deployment.
RecommendedAction: Verify your IT department installed this for system management. Remove if found on personal computers.

Description: Remote management agent (often MeshCentral) used for IT administration and remote computer control in business environments.
RecommendedAction: Immediately verify this is authorized by your IT department or service provider. Remove if unauthorized.

Description: Enterprise IT management platform used by managed service providers to monitor, maintain, and secure business computers.
RecommendedAction: Immediately verify with your business that there's an authorized IT service contract.

Description: Professional remote monitoring and management platform used by IT service providers to maintain business computer systems.
RecommendedAction: Confirm your business has a legitimate contract with an IT service provider.

Description: Business-focused remote monitoring and management platform used by IT service providers for system maintenance and security.
RecommendedAction: Verify through official company channels that this software is authorized.

Description: All-in-one RMM platform used by managed service providers for IT management and monitoring.
RecommendedAction: Verify your business has a contract with an IT service provider using Atera.

Description: Enterprise remote support and privileged access management platform.
RecommendedAction: Verify this is authorized enterprise software with proper IT approval.

Description: Advanced employee monitoring and user behavior analytics software that tracks detailed computer and internet activity.
RecommendedAction: Verify this is authorized workplace monitoring with proper employee notification. Check company monitoring policies.

Description: LogMeIn's remote support tool used by IT professionals for technical assistance and troubleshooting.
RecommendedAction: Check if your IT department or authorized support personnel installed this tool.

Description: Cloud-based remote support software for IT help desk and customer support.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was installed for legitimate remote support purposes.

Description: Cisco's collaboration platform that includes screen sharing and remote control features. Commonly used for business meetings.
RecommendedAction: Generally safe if your organization uses WebEx for meetings and collaboration.

Description: Remote desktop software that doesn't require installation. Often used in tech support scams.
RecommendedAction: CAUTION: Frequently used by scammers. Verify any installation was by legitimate tech support only.

Description: Enterprise remote support software by SolarWinds for IT administration.
RecommendedAction: Verify this is part of authorized enterprise IT management tools.

Description: Legacy remote access software by Symantec. Discontinued but may still be found on older systems.
RecommendedAction: Legacy software with known security issues. Consider updating to modern remote access solutions.

Description: Simple remote desktop sharing software for temporary access.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was installed for legitimate remote access or support purposes.

Description: Remote desktop software for accessing computers remotely without complex configuration.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was installed intentionally for remote access needs.

Description: Remote desktop software with host and viewer components for IT support.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was installed by authorized IT personnel for support purposes.

Description: Remote assistance tool for MSPs and IT support professionals.
RecommendedAction: Verify your IT service provider uses MSP360 tools for legitimate support.

Description: Remote support software for help desk and customer support teams.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was installed for legitimate remote support purposes.

Description: High-performance remote desktop software for accessing Linux and Windows systems.
RecommendedAction: Verify this was installed for legitimate remote access to servers or workstations.

Description: Microsoft's built-in remote desktop feature that allows remote access to Windows computers.
RecommendedAction: Generally normal. Verify remote desktop is configured according to your needs.

Description: Microsoft's built-in remote assistance tool for providing help to other users.
RecommendedAction: Standard Windows feature. May indicate recent tech support session.

Description: Microsoft's built-in remote assistance tool used for providing technical support to other users.
RecommendedAction: Normal Windows feature. May indicate recent tech support session.

Description: Remote Access Trojan (malicious software) designed to provide unauthorized remote control of infected computers.
RecommendedAction: IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED: Disconnect from internet, run full antivirus scan, and seek professional malware removal assistance.

Description: Monitoring software that records keystrokes, screenshots, and computer activity. Used for employee monitoring or parental controls.
RecommendedAction: Determine who installed this and why. Remove if unauthorized. Check company monitoring policies.

Description: Computer monitoring software that records user activity including keystrokes, screenshots, and web browsing.
RecommendedAction: Verify if this is authorized workplace monitoring or parental control software. Remove if unknown.

Description: Parental control and monitoring software designed to track children's computer and internet activity.
RecommendedAction: Verify this is intentional parental monitoring. Remove if found on adult/work computers.

Description: Employee and parental monitoring software for tracking computer and internet usage.
RecommendedAction: Verify if this is authorized monitoring software. Check with IT or remove if unauthorized.

Description: Computer monitoring software for tracking user activity and behavior.
RecommendedAction: Verify if this is authorized monitoring software. Remove if installed without permission.

Description: Keystroke logging software that records everything typed on the computer.
RecommendedAction: Verify if this is authorized monitoring. Remove immediately if installed without knowledge or consent.

Description: Advanced keylogging software that captures keystrokes and screen activity.
RecommendedAction: Verify if this is authorized monitoring. Remove immediately if unauthorized or unknown.
